short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share desktops or windows during a call with other Attend Anywhere Video Call participants.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows participants in an Attend Anywhere video call session to share their entire desktop or individual application windows with each other.

What is Attend Anywhere?
--------------------------------------

Attend Anywhere is a simple consumer video consulting solution, purpose-built for the health sector.
 
It offers all the value of common services like SkypeÂ® (such as being free, easy, and widely accessible) with the added benefits that people do not need a login, or to download video software, or have a number to call to access a health care service.

In addition, Attend Anywhere provides sophisticated security and privacy measures, workflow management, integration components, and other characteristics needed to support front-line health care delivery.
